anya-e0201n2:8_0: Tattha anuccārite sati suṇantassa avidito attho līnattho nāma.
anya-e0201n2:11_0: Liṅgassa attho paramattho, paññattiatthoti duvidho. Tathā visesanattho, visesyatthoti.
anya-e0201n2:12_1: tassa tassa saddassa paṭiniyato pāṭipuggalikatthoti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0201n2:12_2: Soyeva tasmiṁ tasmiṁ atthe ādimhi sadduppattiyā cirakālañca saddapavattiyā nibaddhakāraṇattā nimittatthoti ca vuccati. So suti, jāti, guṇa, dabba, kriyā, nāma,
anya-e0201n2:13_2: soyeva taṁtaṁnimittayogā nemittakatthoti ca vuccati, so jāti, guṇa, dabba, kriyā,
anya-e0201n2:13_3: nāmavasena pañcavidho. Go, sukko, daṇḍī, pācako, tissoti.
anya-e0201n2:14_0: Tattha gosaddo yadā jātimattaṁ vadati go jātīti,
anya-e0201n2:14_3: tadā suti ca jāti ca visesanaṁ.
anya-e0201n2:15_0: Sukkasaddo yadā guṇamattaṁ vadati sukko guṇoti,
anya-e0201n2:15_3: tadā suti ca guṇajāti ca visesanaṁ.
anya-e0201n2:15_4: Yadā guṇavantaṁ dabbaṁ vadati sukko goti,
anya-e0201n2:15_5: tadā suti ca guṇajāti ca guṇaviseso ca sambandho ca visesanaṁ.
anya-e0201n2:16_0: Daṇḍīsaddo yadā jātimattaṁ vadati daṇḍī jātīti,
anya-e0201n2:16_2: Yadā dabbavantaṁ dabbaṁ vadati daṇḍī purisoti,
anya-e0201n2:16_3: tadā suti ca dabbañca jāti ca sambandho ca visesanaṁ.
anya-e0201n2:17_0: Pācakasaddo yadā jātimattaṁ vadati pācako jātīti,
anya-e0201n2:17_1: tadā suti ca kriyā ca visesanaṁ.
anya-e0201n2:17_2: Yadā kriyānipphādakaṁ dabbaṁ vadati pācako purisoti,
anya-e0201n2:17_3: tadā suti ca kriyā ca jāti ca kriyākārakasambandho ca visesanaṁ.
anya-e0201n2:18_0: Tissasaddo yadā nāmamattaṁ vadati tisso nāmanti,
anya-e0201n2:18_4: tadā suti ca nāmajāti ca sambandho ca visesanaṁ.
anya-e0201n2:19_1: taṁ taṁ visesyanti ca dabbanti ca veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0201n2:19_2: Ettha ca suti nāma saddasabhāvā eva hoti,
anya-e0201n2:19_4: Sabbo saddo paṭhamaṁ sattābhidhāyakoti ca ñāse vuttaṁ.
anya-e0201n2:19_5: Tasmā sabbattha sutiṭṭhāne sattā eva yuttā vattunti.
anya-e0201n2:19_6: Sattāti ca tassa tassa atthassa vohāramattenapi loke vijjamānatā vuccati,
anya-e0201n2:19_7: taṁ taṁ saddaṁ suṇantassa ca ñāṇaṁ taṁtadatthassa atthitāmattaṁ sabbapaṭhamaṁ jānāti,
anya-e0201n2:19_9: Guṇasadde guṇanti evamādi sabbaṁ vattabbaṁ. Liṅga, saṅkhyā,
anya-e0201n2:20_5: ye ca saddesu ceva atthesu ca visadā’visadākāra,
anya-e0201n2:21_1: visesyavasena duvidho attho pubbe vuttassa saddaliṅgassa attho nāma,
anya-e0201n2:22_0: Tattha saliṅgo yathā? Saññā, phasso, cittaṁ. Kaññā, puriso, kulaṁ. Mālā, rukkho, dhananti.
anya-e0201n2:23_0: Sasaṅkhyo yathā? Eko, dve, tayo, bahū iccādi.
anya-e0201n2:24_0: Saparimāṇo yathā? Vidatthi, hattho, doṇo, āḷhakaṁ iccādi.
anya-e0201n2:25_9: labbhāiccādi idha pāṭipadikaṁ nāma. Tuna, tvāna, tvā, tave, tuṁ,
anya-e0201n2:26_12: Sabbo suddho ceva vuttasaṁsaṭṭho ca paṭhamāya visayo.
anya-e0201n2:27_3: Ettha ca vibhattiyā vinā kevalo saddo payogaṁ nārahatīti katvā payogārahatthameva chabbidhe suddhe catubbidhe ca vuttasaṁsaṭṭhe paṭhamā payujjati,
anya-e0201n2:28_0: Kenaci vācakena avuttāni pana kammādīni vibhattīhi vinā viditāni na hontītikatvā atthajotanatthampi kammādīsu dutiyādayo payujjanti.
anya-e0201n2:28_1: Tasmā atthamatteti idha desantarāvacchedake visayamatte bhummaṁ.
anya-e0201n2:28_2: Kamme dutiyāiccādīsu pana nipphādetabbe payojane bhummanti evaṁ dvinnaṁ bhummānaṁ nānattaṁ veditabbanti.
anya-e0201n2:30_0: Pageva siddhassa vatthuno nāmena vā nipātena vā attano abhimukhīkaraṇaṁ āmantanaṁ nāma.
anya-e0201n2:30_2: Ettha ca āmantanapadaṁ nāma kriyāpekkhaṁ na hoti,
anya-e0201n2:31_0: Taṁ pana duvidhaṁ sādarā’nādaravasena. Ehi samma, ehi jeti.
anya-e0201n2:33_3: kahaṁ ekaputtakāti saṁ. ni. 2.63; dha. pa. aṭṭha. 1.2.
anya-e0201n2:34_2: acchariyaṁ vata bho abbhutaṁ vata bho dī. ni. 2.192.
anya-e0201n2:34_3: Yatra hi nāma saññī samānotiādi dī. ni. 2.192.
anya-e0201n2:34_4: Idaṁ āmantanaṁ nāma pageva siddhe eva hoti,
anya-e0201n2:34_6: na hi pageva rājabhāvaṁ vā bhikkhubhāvaṁ vā appattaṁ janaṁ “bho rājā”ti vā “bho bhikkhū”ti vā āmantentīti.
anya-e0201n2:45_0: Dhātukammaṁ, kāritakammanti duvidhaṁ. Gāmaṁ gacchati, purisaṁ gāmaṁ gameti.
anya-e0201n2:47_1: khīraṁ’ iccādi padhānakammaṁ nāma kattārā pariggahetuṁ iṭṭhatarattā. ‘Gāmaṁ,
anya-e0201n2:50_0: 292.Gatibodhāhārasaddatthā kammaka bhajjādīnaṁ payojjeka. 300; rū. 286; nī. 587; caṁ. 2.1.44; pā. 1.4.52.
anya-e0201n2:51_1: Gamanatthānaṁ bodhanatthānaṁ āhāratthānaṁ saddatthānaṁ akammakānaṁ bhajjādīnañca dhātūnaṁ payojje kammani dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n2:51_2: Ettha ca payojjakammaṁ nāma kāritakammaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0201n2:53_0: Etesamīti kiṁ? Puriso purisena odanaṁ pāceti.
anya-e0201n2:54_0: Ettha ca gamanatthādīnaṁ payojje tatiyāpi rūpasiddhiyaṁ 141 piṭṭhe saddanītiyañca sutta-148 piṭṭhe vuttā.
anya-e0201n2:55_0: Yadā pana paṭhamaṁ payojakaṁ añño dutiyo payojeti,
anya-e0201n2:55_3: Attanā vippakataṁ kuṭiṁ parehi pariyosāpeti pārā. 363.
anya-e0201n2:57_0: Harādīnaṁ payojje kammani vikappena dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n2:58_0: Sāmiko purisaṁ bhāraṁ hāreti purisena vā,
anya-e0201n2:58_3: rājā purisaṁ attānaṁ dasseti purisena vā,
anya-e0201n2:60_0: Khādādīnaṁ payojje kammani na dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n2:63_6: vahadhātussa tādise aniyantuke payojje kammani dutiyā na hoti.
anya-e0201n2:67_0: Bhakkhituṁ icchantassa bhakkhāpanaṁ hiṁsā nāma na hoti,
anya-e0201n2:67_2: bhakkhadhātussa payojje kammani ahiṁsāvisaye dutiyā na hoti.
anya-e0201n2:69_0: Ahiṁsāyanti kiṁ? Balībadde sassaṁ bhakkhāpeti. Ettha ‘sassa’nti thūlataraṁ sassanti vadanti.
anya-e0201n2:70_4: Therassa patto dutiyassa gāhetabbo” iccādinā pārā.
anya-e0201n2:72_0: Dhīiccādīhi nipātopasaggehi yuttā liṅgamhā dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n2:73_6: Antarā ca rājagahaṁ antarā ca nāḷandaṁ dī. ni. 1.1,
anya-e0201n2:74_0: Tathā paṭibhāti maṁ bhagavā udā. 45; saṁ. ni. 1.217,
anya-e0201n2:74_1: apissu maṁ tisso upamāyo paṭibhaṁsu ma. ni. 1.374,
anya-e0201n2:74_2: paṭibhātu taṁ bhikkhu dhammo bhāsituṁ mahāva. 258.
anya-e0201n2:74_3: Paṭibhantu taṁ cunda bojjhaṅgā saṁ. ni. 3.79 –
anya-e0201n2:75_4: mañcaṁ vā pīṭhaṁ vā abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā pāci. 130,
anya-e0201n2:77_6: ekaṁ samayaṁ khu. pā. 5.1; dī. ni. 1.1,
anya-e0201n2:77_22: imāsu disāsu katamāya disāya tiṭṭhati chaddantanāgarājāti atthoiccādi.
anya-e0201n2:79_0: Lakkhaṇādīsu atthesu pavattena abhinā yuttā liṅgamhā dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n2:82_2: vijjobhāsena byāpito rukkho vijjuppādassa lakkhaṇaṁ saññāṇaṁ hoti.
anya-e0201n2:84_1: mātaraṁ abhi visiṭṭhaṁ katvā sādhūti attho,
anya-e0201n2:84_2: devadatto sakkaccaṁ mātupaṭṭhāne aggapurisoti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0201n2:84_3: Taṁ kho pana bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato pārā. 1.
anya-e0201n2:84_4: Ettha ca ‘abbhuggato’ti abhi visiṭṭhaṁ katvā uggatoti attho,
anya-e0201n2:84_5: ayaṁ kittisaddo bhoto gotamassa sakalalokaggabhāvaṁ pakāsetvā uggatoti vuttaṁ hoti,
anya-e0201n2:84_6: kittisaddasambandhe pana tassa kho pana bhoto gotamassāti attho.
anya-e0201n2:86_0: Rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁ abhi vijjotate cando, byāpetvā vijjotatetyattho.
anya-e0201n2:87_0: Ettha ca lakkhaṇādiatthā abhisaddena jotanīyā piṇḍatthā eva,
anya-e0201n2:88_0: 299.Patiparīhi bhāge caka. 299; rū. 288; nī. 582, 586; caṁ. 2.1.55; pā. 1.4.90.
anya-e0201n2:89_0: Lakkhaṇi’tthambhūta, vicchāsu ca bhāge ca pavattehi pati, parīhi yuttā liṅgamhā dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n2:93_0: Sādhu devadatto mātaraṁ pati, sādhu devadatto mātaraṁ pari.
anya-e0201n2:95_0: Rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁ pati vijjotate cando, rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁ pari vijjotate cando.
anya-e0201n2:97_8: Ettha maṁ uddissa yaṁ vatthu ṭhapitaṁ siyā,
anya-e0201n2:97_10: etesu bahūsu bhāgesu yo mama bhāgo,
anya-e0201n2:99_0: Lakkhaṇi’tthambhūta, vicchāsu ca bhāge ca pavattena anunā yuttā liṅgamhā dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n2:101_6: vipassibodhisatte pabbajite sati tānipi caturāsītikulaputtasahassāni pabbajiṁsūti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0201n2:101_10: saccakriyāya sati saccakriyahetu devo pāvassīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0201n2:103_0: Sādhu devadatto mātaramanu. Tattha ‘anū’ti anvāya paṭicca.
anya-e0201n2:105_0: Rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁ anu vijjotate cando. Tattha ‘anū’ti anu pharitvā.
anya-e0201n2:107_0: Yadettha maṁ anu siyā, taṁ dīyatu. Tattha ‘anū’ti anvāya. Sesaṁ vuttanayameva.
anya-e0201n2:109_0: Sahatthe anunā yuttā liṅgamhā dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n2:110_3: nadiyā saha ābaddhā tiṭṭhatīti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0201n2:112_0: Hīne pavattena anunā yuttā liṅgamhā dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n2:113_2: sabbe paññavanto sāriputtato hīnāti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0201n2:115_0: Hīne upena yuttā liṅgamhā dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n2:116_0: Upa sāriputtaṁ paññavanto, upecca gatā samīpe gatāti attho, hīnātveva vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0201n2:117_0: Ettha ca abhiiccādayo kammappavacanīyāti saddasatthesu vuttā.
anya-e0201n2:118_0: Tattha byāpanādikriyāvisesavācīhi upasaggehi sambandhesati kammatthe dutiyā hoti,
anya-e0201n2:120_0: Kālassa vā addhuno vā dabba, guṇa,
anya-e0201n2:120_1: kriyāhi accantaṁ nirantaraṁ saṁyoge kāla’ddhānavācīhi liṅgehi paraṁ dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n2:124_0: Yojanaṁ vanarāji, yojanaṁ dīgho pabbato, kosaṁ sajjhāyati.
anya-e0201n2:125_0: Accantasaṁyogeti kiṁ? Māse māse bhuñjati, yojane yojane vihāro.
anya-e0201n2:126_0: Ettha ca kriyāvisesanampi kattārā sādhetabbattā kammagatikaṁ hoti,
anya-e0201n2:126_1: tasmā tampi ‘kamme dutiyā’ti ettha kammasaddena gayhati.
anya-e0201n2:132_1: Kattāti ca kārakoti ca atthato ekaṁ “karotīti kattā,
anya-e0201n2:132_3: tasmā “kattukārako”ti vutte dvinnaṁ pariyāyasaddānaṁ vasena ayameva kriyaṁ ekantaṁ karoti,
anya-e0201n2:132_6: tato kriyā nāma kattuno eva byāpāro,
anya-e0201n2:132_8: aññe pana kriyāsādhane kattuno upakārakattā kārakā nāmāti ca,
anya-e0201n2:132_9: tathā anupakārakattā akārakā nāmāti ca viññāyantīti.
anya-e0201n2:133_0: Tattha kattā tividho sayaṁkattā, payojakakattā, kammakattāti.
anya-e0201n2:134_0: Tattha dhātvatthaṁ sayaṁ karonto sayaṁkattā nāma, puriso kammaṁ karoti.
anya-e0201n2:135_0: Paraṁ niyojento payojakakattā nāma, puriso dāsaṁ kammaṁ kāreti.
anya-e0201n2:136_1: puriso dāsena kammaṁ kāreti dāsassa vā,
anya-e0201n2:136_2: yo ca aññena kataṁ payogaṁ paṭicca kammabhūtopi sukarattā vā kammabhāvena avattukāmatāya vā ajānanatāya
anya-e0201n2:136_7: Apica sukaro vā hotu dukkaro vā,
anya-e0201n2:136_10: Saddarūpena kammañca taṁ attharūpena kattā cāti kammakattā,
anya-e0201n2:137_3: Paññattattho pana koci vijjamānoti sammato. Yathā?
anya-e0201n2:137_12: vattamāno ca saddo atthaṁ na dīpetīti natthi,
anya-e0201n2:137_13: saṅkete sati suṇantassa atthavisayaṁ buddhiṁ na janetīti natthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0201n2:137_14: Iti avijjamānasammatopi attho saddabuddhīnaṁ visayabhāvena vijjamāno eva hoti.
anya-e0201n2:137_15: Itarathā ‘vañjhāputto’ti padaṁ suṇantassa tadatthavisayaṁ cittaṁ nāma na pavatteyyāti,
anya-e0201n2:137_16: saddabuddhīnañca visayabhāvena vijjamāno nāma attho saddanānātte buddhinānātte ca sati nānā hoti,
anya-e0201n2:137_17: visuṁ visuṁ vijjamāno nāma hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0201n2:137_18: Evaṁ saddabuddhivisayabhāvena vijjamānañca nānābhūtañca atthaṁ paṭicca kārakanānāttaṁ kriyākārakanānāttañca hoti,
anya-e0201n2:137_19: na pana sabhāvato vijjamānameva nānābhūtameva ca atthanti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ.
anya-e0201n2:137_20: Tasmā “saṁyogo jāyate” iccādīsu saddabuddhīnaṁ nānāttasiddhena atthanānāttena dvinnaṁ saddānaṁ dvinnaṁ atthānañca kriyākārakatāsiddhi veditabbāti.
anya-e0201n2:139_0: Tattha kattuno aṅgabhūtaṁ karaṇaṁ ajjhattikaṁ nāma,
anya-e0201n2:142_1: sahatthena saddena yuttā liṅgamhā tatiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n2:143_5: puttena saha āgato pitā. Saha, saddhiṁ, samaṁ, nānā,
anya-e0201n2:144_3: saṅgho saha vā gaggena vinā vā gaggena uposathaṁ kareyya mahāva. 167.
anya-e0201n2:146_0: Lakkhaṇaṁ vuccati itthambhūtalakkhaṇaṁ, tasmiṁ tatiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n2:147_6: ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeti pārā.
anya-e0201n2:147_8: bhikkhu pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena vilokitena samiñjitena pasāritena gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi,
anya-e0201n2:147_9: sā kāḷī dāsī bhinnena sīsena lohitena galantena pativissakānaṁ ujjhāpesi ma. ni. 1.226,
anya-e0201n2:148_0: Aṅgavikāropi idha saṅgayhati ka. 291; rū. 299; nī. 603,
anya-e0201n2:148_3: vikalena cakkhuaṅgena so kāṇo nāma hoti.
anya-e0201n2:150_0: Hinoti pavattati phalaṁ etenāti hetu, tasmiṁ tatiyā hoti.
anya-e0201n2:151_3: kammunā vattati pajā ma. ni. 2.460; su. ni.
anya-e0201n2:152_0: Ettha ca karaṇaṁ tividhaṁ kriyāsādhakakaraṇaṁ, visesanakaraṇaṁ, nānāttakaraṇanti.
anya-e0201n2:156_0: Tathā kammā’vadhi, ādhāra’ccantasaṁyoga, kriyāpavaggāpi nānāttakaraṇe saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0201n2:158_0: Tilehi khette vappati, tantavāyehi cīvaraṁ vāyāpeti, sunakhehi khādāpenti iccādi.
anya-e0201n2:160_2: cakkhu suññaṁ attena vā attaniyena vā saṁ. ni. 4.85,
anya-e0201n2:162_0: Tena khaṇena tena layena tena muhuttena mahāva. 17,
anya-e0201n2:162_3: So vo mamaccayena satthā dī. ni. 2.216,
anya-e0201n2:162_4: tiṇṇaṁ māsānaṁ accayena dī. ni. 2.168; udā. 51,
anya-e0201n2:162_8: dakkhiṇena virūḷhako pacchimena virūpakkho dī. ni. 2.336,
anya-e0201n2:170_0: Sampadāne catutthī hoti. Sammā padīyate assāti sampadānaṁ, sampaṭicchakanti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0201n2:172_2: Tattha na nirākaroti na nivāretīti anirākaraṇaṁ,
anya-e0201n2:172_4: Asati hi paṭikkhipane sampaṭicchanaṁ nāma hotīti.
anya-e0201n2:172_5: Kāyacittehi sampaṭicchanākāraṁ dassetvā paṭiggaṇhantaṁ sampadānaṁ anumati nāma.
anya-e0201n2:172_6: Vividhehi āyācanavacanehi parassa cittaṁ ārādhetvā sampaṭicchantaṁ ārādhanaṁ nāma.
anya-e0201n2:175_0: Tañca amhākaṁ ruccati ceva khamati ca ma. ni. 1.179; ma. ni. 2.435,
anya-e0201n2:175_11: tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ lūkhāni bhojanāni nacchādenti mahāva.
anya-e0201n2:177_0: Chattaggāho rañño chattaṁ dhāreti, sampatijātassa bodhisattassa devā chattaṁ dhārayiṁsu.
anya-e0201n2:178_4: bhikkhunī bhikkhussa bhuñjamānassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upaṭṭhāti pāci.
anya-e0201n2:178_15: sapathampi te samma ahaṁ karomi jā. 2.21.407,
anya-e0201n2:178_16: tava mayi saddahanatthaṁ saccaṁ karomīti attho,
anya-e0201n2:178_18: idha kulaputto na kassaci kiñci dhāreti a. ni. 4.62,
anya-e0201n2:178_20: Tattha ‘rañño sataṁ dhāretī’ti sataṁ balidhanaṁ vā daṇḍadhanaṁ vā nidetīti nidhetīti,
anya-e0201n2:179_0: Devāpi te pihayanti tādino dha. pa.
anya-e0201n2:180_6: yo appaduṭṭhassa narassa dussati dha. pa. 125; su. ni. 667; jā. 1.5.94,
anya-e0201n2:181_2: patipubbassa ca gī-dhātussa yoge sampadāne catutthī.
anya-e0201n2:181_4: “bhaddante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ a. ni. 1.1.
anya-e0201n2:181_5: Ettha ca pubbavākye āmantanakriyāya kattā bhagavā,
anya-e0201n2:181_9: rājā bimbisāro pilindavacchattherassa ārāmikaṁ paṭissutvā mahāva. 270,
anya-e0201n2:185_0: Tassā tassā kriyāya atthoti tadattho, tadatthe sampadāne catutthī hoti.
anya-e0201n2:187_0: Akārantato catutthībhūtassa sassa āyo hoti vā.
anya-e0201n2:188_13: atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ ma. ni. 1.50,
anya-e0201n2:191_4: kiṁ me ekena tiṇṇena bu. vaṁ. 2.56,
anya-e0201n2:197_10: sotthi te hotu sotthi gabbhassa ma. ni. 2.351,
anya-e0201n2:200_9: upamaṁ te karissāmi ma. ni. 1.258; jā. 2.19.24,
anya-e0201n2:205_0: Avadhiyati vavatthiyati padattho etasmāti avadhi, tasmiṁ pañcamī hoti, avadhīti ca apādānaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0201n2:206_0: Apanetvā ito aññaṁ ādadāti gaṇhātīti apādānaṁ.
anya-e0201n2:207_0: Tattha yasmiṁ apādānavisayabhūto kriyāviseso sarūpato niddiṭṭho hoti,
anya-e0201n2:208_0: Yasmiṁ pana so pāṭhasesaṁ katvā ajjhāharitabbo hoti,
anya-e0201n2:209_0: Yasmiṁ pana so niddiṭṭho ca na hoti,
anya-e0201n2:209_2: atha kho atthato anumānavasena so viññeyyo hoti,
anya-e0201n2:209_10: Kriyaṁ vinā kārakaṁ nāma na sijjhatītikatvā ukkaṁsanakriyā ettha anumetabbā hoti.
anya-e0201n2:211_7: itarītarakriyāya avadhī hontīti natthi ettha avadhilakkhaṇavirodhoti.
anya-e0201n2:212_0: Acalaṁ yathā? Gāmā apenti munayo, nagarā niggato rājā.
anya-e0201n2:213_5: ito sā dakkhiṇā disā dī. ni. 3.279.
anya-e0201n2:213_12: Atthi te ito bhayaṁ ma. ni. 2.350,
anya-e0201n2:213_34: pāpato ottappati jigucchati harāyati pāpena vā.
anya-e0201n2:214_0: Yato kiñci sippaṁ vā vijjaṁ vā dhammaṁ vā gaṇhāti,
anya-e0201n2:216_0: Yato labhati, tasmiṁ pañcamī, saṅghato labhati, gaṇato labhati.
anya-e0201n2:217_5: pāḷiyaṁ pana parājiyoge apādānaṁ pāṭhasesavasena labbhati,
anya-e0201n2:217_6: tasmiṁ kho pana saṅgāme devā jiniṁsu,
anya-e0201n2:217_10: Himavantā pabhavanti pañca mahānadiyo a. ni. aṭṭha. 3.8.19,
anya-e0201n2:217_17: yaṁkiñci bhayaṁ vā veraṁ vā upaddavo vā upasaggo vā jāyati,
anya-e0201n2:217_24: cīvaraṁ uppajjeyya saṅghato vā gaṇato vā ñātimittato vā pārā.
anya-e0201n2:218_0: Aññatthānaṁ yoge pañcamī, tato aññaṁ, tato paraṁ mahāva. 346, tato aparena samayena pārā. 195.
anya-e0201n2:221_0: Vajjane pavattehi apa, parīhi yoge pañcamī hoti.
anya-e0201n2:222_5: Kaccāyane pana “uparipabbatā devo vassatī”ti pāṭho porāṇapāṭho,
anya-e0201n2:224_1: paṭidānaṁ nāma paṭibhaṇḍadānaṁ tesu pavattena patinā yoge pañcamī hoti.
anya-e0201n2:225_0: Buddhasmā pati sāriputto dhammaṁ deseti, telasmā pati ghataṁ deti.
anya-e0201n2:227_0: Ritesaddena yoge pañcamī hoti dutiyā ca.
anya-e0201n2:229_0: 316.Vināññatrehi tatiyā caka. 272; rū. 309; nī. 558, 568; caṁ. 2.1.85; pā. 2.3.32;
anya-e0201n2:230_0: Vajjane pavattehi vinā, aññatrasaddehi yoge pañcamī, dutiyā, tatiyā ca honti.
anya-e0201n2:233_0: Vajjane pavattehi puthu, nānāsaddehi ca yoge pañcamī, tatiyā ca honti.
anya-e0201n2:234_4: piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo dī. ni. 2.183; cūḷava. 437.
anya-e0201n2:234_5: “Te bhikkhū nānākulā pabbajitā”ti ettha pana nānāppakārattho nānāsaddo,
anya-e0201n2:234_7: ettha ca vajjanattho nāma viyogattho asammissattho.
anya-e0201n2:235_0: Mariyādā’bhividhīsu pavattehi āsadda, yāvasaddehi yogepi pañcamī, dutiyā ca.
anya-e0201n2:237_3: Ābhavaggā bhagavato kittisaddo abbhuggato ābhavaggaṁ vā,
anya-e0201n2:237_4: bhavato ābhavaggaṁ dhammato āgotrabhuṁ savantīti āsavā,
anya-e0201n2:238_2: yatohaṁ bhagini ariyāya jātiyā jāto ma. ni. 2.351,
anya-e0201n2:240_0: Saha sabbaññutaññāṇappaṭilābhā, saha parinibbānā dī. ni. 2.220, saha dassanuppādā.
anya-e0201n2:241_0: “Uppādā vā tathāgatānaṁ anuppādā vā tathāgatāna”nti saṁ. ni. 2.20, ettha bhāvalakkhaṇe pañcamī.
anya-e0201n2:242_0: “Sahatthā dānaṁ deti, sahatthā paṭiggaṇhātī”ti ettha karaṇe.
anya-e0201n2:243_0: “Ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ dī. ni. 1.250, tadagge kho vāseṭṭha”iccādīsu dī. ni. 3.130, ārabbhe sattamī.
anya-e0201n2:245_0: Dvinnaṁ kārakānaṁ kriyānañca majjhe pavattakāladdhānavācīhi pañcamī,
anya-e0201n2:245_3: Ettha ca luddako sakiṁ migaṁ vijjhitvā pakkhabbhantaramhi na vijjhi,
anya-e0201n2:245_5: pakkhasaddo dvinnaṁ vijjhanavārānaṁ majjhe kālavācī hoti,
anya-e0201n2:245_6: dvepi vijjhanakriyā kārakehi saheva sijjhantīti kārakānañca majjheti vuccati.
anya-e0201n2:245_7: Vuttiyaṁ pana “ajja bhutvā devadatto dvihe bhuñjissati,
anya-e0201n2:247_10: Rājato vā corato vā ārakkhaṁ gaṇhantu.
anya-e0201n2:250_2: atikhippaṁ loke cakkhu antaradhāyissati dī. ni.
anya-e0201n2:250_9: “Bhagavato purato antaradhāyitvā”ti etthapi tosaddo sattamyatthe eva.
anya-e0201n2:252_8: Dutiyā ca tatiyā ca chaṭṭhī ca,
anya-e0201n2:252_9: ārakā imaṁ dhammavinayaṁ iminā dhammavinayena vā,
anya-e0201n2:254_1: addasā kho bhagavantaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ dī. ni. 1.409,
anya-e0201n2:256_3: Dutiyā ca tatiyā ca chaṭṭhī ca,
anya-e0201n2:258_5: ito tiṇṇaṁ māsānaṁ accayena parinibbāyissāmi dī. ni. 2.168; udā.
anya-e0201n2:260_3: yojanaṁ āyāmena yojanaṁ vitthārena yojanaṁ ubbedhena sāsaparāsi saṁ. ni.
anya-e0201n2:261_1: Ettha ca tvālopo nāma paripuṇṇavākye laddhabbassa tvāntapadassa aparipuṇṇavākye natthi bhāvo,
anya-e0201n2:261_2: yañca padaṁ tvāntapade sati kammaṁ vā hoti adhikaraṇaṁ vā.
anya-e0201n2:261_3: Taṁ tvāntapade asati padantare avadhi hoti,
anya-e0201n2:261_5: pāsādā vā pāsādaṁ saṅkameyya saṁ. ni. 1.132,
anya-e0201n2:261_6: hatthikkhandhā vā hatthikkhandhaṁ saṅkameyya saṁ. ni.
anya-e0201n2:261_8: Ettha ca paṭhamaṁ ekaṁ pāsādaṁ abhirūhitvā puna aññaṁ pāsādaṁ saṅkameyyāti vā paṭhamaṁ ekasmiṁ pāsāde
anya-e0201n2:261_9: nisīditvā puna aññaṁ pāsādaṁ saṅkameyyāti vā evaṁ paripuṇṇavākyaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0201n2:261_11: tamā vā tamaṁ gaccheyyā”ti saṁ. ni.
anya-e0201n2:261_24: Etthapi paṭhamaṁ ekaṁ vinayavacanaṁ pucchitvā vā ekasmiṁ vinayavacane ṭhatvā vā puna aññaṁ vinayavacanaṁ pucchatīti paripuṇṇavākyaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0201n2:262_1: ito sā purimā disā dī. ni. 3.278,
anya-e0201n2:262_2: ito sā dakkhiṇā disā dī. ni. 3.278,
anya-e0201n2:262_5: adho kesamatthakā dī. ni. 2.377; ma. ni. 1.110.
anya-e0201n2:266_1: Vibhatti nāma pageva visuṁbhūtassa atthassa kenaci adhikena vā hīnena vā bhāgena tadaññato puthakkaraṇaṁ,
anya-e0201n2:266_3: yato paṇītataro vā visiṭṭhataro vā natthi,
anya-e0201n2:266_11: paññavantā nāma sāriputtato hīnā sāriputtassa vā,
anya-e0201n2:266_12: tato adhikaṁ vā ūnaṁ vā na vaṭṭati iccādi.
anya-e0201n2:268_0: Āratī viratī pāpā khu. pā. 5.8, pāṇātipātā veramaṇi khu. pā. 2.1 iccādi.
anya-e0201n2:271_1: so parimuccati jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
anya-e0201n2:271_2: parimutto so dukkhasmāti vadāmi saṁ. ni. 3.29,
anya-e0201n2:273_2: kasmā nu tumhaṁ kule daharā na miyyare jā.
anya-e0201n2:275_0: Vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi dī. ni. 1.226, vivitto pāpakā dhammā.
anya-e0201n2:281_0: Ajjhattabhūto hetu guṇo nāma, aguṇopi idha guṇotveva vuccati, tasmiṁ pañcamī hoti vā.
anya-e0201n2:282_7: issariyā janaṁ rakkhati rājā issariyena vā,
anya-e0201n2:282_14: catunnaṁ ariyasaccānaṁ anaññā appaṭivedhā dīghamaddhānaṁ saṁsaranti dī. ni.
anya-e0201n2:283_0: Pañhā, kathanesupi pañcamī, kuto bhavaṁ, ahaṁ pāṭaliputtato iccādi.
anya-e0201n2:284_3: muccanamattaṁ hotīti vuttaṁ hoti “nadiṁ taranto manaṁ vuḷho”ti mahāva.
anya-e0201n2:285_0: Asatvavacaneti kiṁ? Paccati munino bhattaṁ, thokaṁ thokaṁ ghare ghareti theragā. 248 (kule kule).
anya-e0201n2:286_0: “Anupubbena medhāvī, thokaṁ thokaṁ khaṇe khaṇe dha. pa. 239” iccādīsu kriyāvisesane dutiyā.
anya-e0201n2:287_1: tassa kammassa katattā upacitattā ussannattā vipulattā tathāgato suppatiṭṭhitapādo hoti dī. ni. 3.201.
anya-e0201n2:287_5: sova kattā na hotīti vattuṁ sakkā”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0201n2:287_6: Etena kattusadiso janakahetu akattā nāmāti dīpeti,
anya-e0201n2:289_1: tiṇā bhiyyo na maññati dī. ni. 3.253,
anya-e0201n2:289_3: khantyā bhiyyo na vijjati saṁ. ni. 1.250,
anya-e0201n2:289_6: attamano tvaṁ hohi paraṁ viya mattāya,
anya-e0201n2:289_7: ahampi attamano homi paraṁ viya mattāya.
anya-e0201n2:294_0: Dvinnaṁ sambandhīnaṁ kenaci pakārena āyattabhāvo sambandho nāma,
anya-e0201n2:295_0: Tattha kriyākārakasañjāto assedambhāvahetuko sambandho nāmāti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0201n2:295_1: Tattha dve sambandhino aññamaññaṁ taṁtaṁkriyaṁ karonti,
anya-e0201n2:295_2: taṁ disvā “ime aññamaññasambandhino”ti jānantassa dvinnaṁ kārakānaṁ dvinnaṁ kriyānañca saṁyogaṁ nissāya sambandhopi vidito hoti,
anya-e0201n2:295_4: ‘imassa aya’nti evaṁ pavattabuddhiyā hetubhūtattā assedambhāvahetuko ca.
anya-e0201n2:296_0: Tattha sambandho tividho sāmisambandho, nānāttasambandho, kriyākārakasambandhoti.
anya-e0201n2:297_1: tasmā visesyapadatthassa taṁtaṁvisesanabhāvena sambandho sāmisambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n2:299_0: Tattha tassa mātā, tassa pitāiccādi janakasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n2:300_0: Tassā putto, tassā dhītā iccādi jaññasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n2:301_0: Tassa bhātā, tassa bhaginī iccādi kulasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n2:302_0: Sakko devānamindo saṁ. ni. 1.248 iccādi sāmisambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n2:303_0: Pahūtaṁ me dhanaṁ sakka jā. 1.15.72, bhikkhussa pattacīvaraṁ iccādi saṁsambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n2:304_0: Ambavanassa avidūre, nibbānasseva santike dha. pa. 32 iccādi samīpasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n2:305_0: Suvaṇṇassa rāsi, bhikkhūnaṁ samūho iccādi samūhasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n2:306_0: Manussasseva te sīsaṁ jā. 1.4.81, rukkhassa sākhā iccādi avayavasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n2:307_0: Suvaṇṇassa bhājanaṁ, alābussa kaṭāhaṁ, bhaṭṭhadhaññānaṁ sattu iccādi vikārasambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n2:309_0: Khandhānaṁ jāti, khandhānaṁ jarā, khandhānaṁ bhedo saṁ. ni. 2.1 iccādi avatthāsambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n2:310_1: vaṇṇo na khīyyetha tathāgatassa dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.304,
anya-e0201n2:311_0: Pādassa ukkhipanaṁ, hatthassa samiñjanaṁ, dhātūnaṁ gamanaṁ ṭhānaṁ iccādi kriyāsambandho nāma.
anya-e0201n2:312_2: so ca kriyāsambandhābhāvā kārako nāma na hoti.
anya-e0201n2:312_3: Yadi evaṁ “pādassa ukkhipanaṁ” iccādi kriyāsambandho nāmāti idaṁ na yujjatīti? Vuccate –
anya-e0201n2:312_4: kriyāsambandhābhāvāti idaṁ sādhakabhāvena sambandhābhāvaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ,
anya-e0201n2:312_5: siddhāya pana kriyāya sambandhaṁ sandhāya kriyāsambandho nāma vuttoti.
anya-e0201n2:314_0: Tu, aka, ana, ṇapaccayānaṁ yoge kvaci kammatthe chaṭṭhī.
anya-e0201n2:319_0: Kammassa kārako natthi, vipākassa ca vedako visuddhi 2.689, avisaṁvādako lokassa dī. ni. 1.9 iccādi.
anya-e0201n2:320_0: Kvacīti kiṁ? Mahatiṁ mahiṁ anusāsako, janaṁ aheṭhako, kaṭaṁ kārako, pasavo ghātako iccādi.
anya-e0201n2:323_0: Kvacīti kiṁ? Bhagavantaṁ dassanāya udā. 23 iccādi.
anya-e0201n2:326_3: catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ upādāya pasādo dha. sa.
anya-e0201n2:327_1: māna’ntānaṁ yoge pana kammani dutiyā eva,
anya-e0201n2:328_0: Kvaci chaṭṭhīpi dissati, dhammassa gutto medhāvī dha. pa. 257 iccādi.
anya-e0201n2:332_2: sobhaṇā buddhaghosassa pakati buddhaghosena vā iccādi.
anya-e0201n2:333_7: 121 pūrati dhaññānaṁ vā muggānaṁ vā māsānaṁ vā iccādi.
anya-e0201n2:334_2: yakkhasenāpatīnaṁ ujjhāpetabbaṁ vikkanditabbaṁ viravitabbaṁ dī. ni.
anya-e0201n2:335_1: kiṁ nu kho ahaṁ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi,
anya-e0201n2:336_3: kusalo tvaṁ rathassa aṅgapaccaṅgānaṁ ma. ni. 2.87,
anya-e0201n2:336_9: santi yakkhā buddhassa pasannā dī. ni.
anya-e0201n2:339_0: Taṁ kissa hetu ma. ni. 1.2; caṁ. 2.1.96; pā. 2.3.72,
anya-e0201n2:341_0: Tulyatthena yoge chaṭṭhī hoti tatiyā vā.
anya-e0201n2:342_0: Tulyo pitu pitarā vā, sadiso pitu pitarā vā. Iti nānāttasambandho.
anya-e0201n2:343_0: Kriyākārakasambandho nāma kārakānaṁ kriyāya saha sādhaka,
anya-e0201n2:343_2: na hi kriyaṁ vinā kārakaṁ nāma sijjhati,
anya-e0201n2:343_3: na ca kārakaṁ vinā kriyā nāma sijjhatīti,
anya-e0201n2:349_2: Tattha kaṭo kattubhūte purise ṭhitaṁ nisīdanakriyaṁ dhāreti,
anya-e0201n2:349_3: thālī kammabhūte taṇḍule ṭhitaṁ pacanakriyaṁ dhāreti.
anya-e0201n2:350_0: So catubbidho byāpikādhāro, opasilesikādhāro, sāmīpikādhāro, vesayikādhāroti.
anya-e0201n2:351_0: Tattha yasmiṁ ādheyyavatthu sakale vā ekadese vā byāpetvā tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0201n2:353_0: Yo pana attho ādheyyassa avatthubhūtopi tadāyattavuttidīpanatthaṁ ādhārabhāvena vohariyati,
anya-e0201n2:354_0: Yo ca attho attanā vinā ādheyyassa aññatthattaṁ kriyaṁ sampādetuṁ asakkuṇeyyattā ādhārabhāvena vohariyati,
anya-e0201n2:354_1: yo ca ādheyyassa anaññābhimukhabhāvadīpanatthaṁ ādhārabhāvena vohariyati,
anya-e0201n2:358_0: 325.Yambhāvo bhāvalakkhaṇaṁka. 313; rū. 327; nī. 644; caṁ. 2.1.90; pā. 2.3.37; ‘yabbhā vo’ (bahūsu).
anya-e0201n2:360_0: Acirapakkantassa sāriputtassa brāhmaṇo kālamakāsi ma. ni.
anya-e0201n2:360_2: appamattassa te viharato itthāgāropi te appamatto viharissati saṁ. ni.
anya-e0201n2:361_1: imasmiṁ asati idaṁ na hoti saṁ. ni. 2.21,
anya-e0201n2:363_0: Pubbaṇhasamaye gato, sāyanhasamaye āgato iccādi vesayikādhāro eva.
anya-e0201n2:366_2: anādarabhūte bhāvalakkhaṇe gamyamāne sattamī chaṭṭhī ca hoti.
anya-e0201n2:371_0: Manussānaṁ khattiyo sūratamo, manussesu khattiyo sūratamo.
anya-e0201n2:375_0: Addhikānaṁ dhāvanto sīghatamo, addhikesu dhāvanto sīghatamo.
anya-e0201n2:377_0: Āyasmā ānando arahataṁ aññataro, arahantesu aññataro iccādi.
anya-e0201n2:382_3: saṅghe dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi ma. ni. 3.376,
anya-e0201n2:383_0: Apādāne ca sattamī, gadalīsu gaje rakkhantiiccādi.
anya-e0201n2:384_0: Sāmissarādiyoge pana chaṭṭhī sattamī ca hoti,
anya-e0201n2:386_0: Adhikabhāvatthe upena yuttā liṅgamhā sattamī hoti.
anya-e0201n2:387_0: Upa khāriyaṁ doṇo, upa nikkhe kahāpaṇaṁ, atirekadoṇā khārī, atirekakahāpaṇaṁ nikkhanti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0201n2:389_0: Sāmibhāvatthe adhinā yuttā liṅgamhā sattamī hoti.
anya-e0201n2:390_3: Tattha ‘adhi brahmadatte pañcālā’ti brahmadattissarā pañcālaraṭṭhavāsinoti vadanti,
anya-e0201n2:392_0: Hetvatthehi yoge sabbādīhi sabbanāmehi hetvatthe sabbā vibhattiyo honti.
